relation: The campus is pretty safe but the campus is open to the public.

There are a lot of clubs and activities for every student on campus no matter what your interested in. if they don't have a club to your interest then you can always start one. They even have clubs for every major offered here on campus.
There are parties on Tuesdays at the sigma house, Thursdays at the Alpha house, and Fridays the Phi Kappa house. There's also sporting events, the student center and movie night.
Its better to eat in the cafÃ© if you don't feel like spending money or you can eat at bully's when bully bucks start.

staying in the dorm isn't all that great but you do get to meet other students that's on your floor. On the 3rd floor of hilly its girls on one side and guys on the other side while the 2nd and 4th floor is all boys and the 5th floor is all girls.
The small class sizes makes it easier to get that one on one help with your teacher and some of the teachers here makes learning fun.
The library will be your best friend so I suggest you go there to do al your homework and the writing center is a good tool to get help on your essays for English.

Barton isn't all that great but they do have several fun activities for students. The school costs a lot of money but its worth it because they have some of the best programs in the country. The best part about this school is the parties and because of that I give the school a B-.

textAfterTable: Great for these types of students Students who are looking for a small campus, small class sizes, and person attention will enjoy and get the most out of Barton College. Tips for prospective students If a student is looking for a small campus with a family feel, where everyone knows each other by first name then Barton College is the place to be. The staff constantly wants feedback to make the college better for students and students always can voice their opinions and are listened to by college directors. Bang for the buck Money spent at Barton is well spent. The Professors are all willing to help if extra assistance is needed. There are no teachers aids here, direct professor to student involvement. Am enjoying being here Barton College is a fun little place in walking distance to downtown Wilson, NC. Wilson is a growing community with new stores and places to eat popping up frequently. As for on campus, there is always something interesting happening, ranging from free movies to pudding slides to worship services. Am learning a lot The Barton College core classes are a solid group of classes that all students
